text: dar asl log ek hee gruh38 thein, Allah taâ€™ala ne nabiyo ko khush qabriya dene aur daraane waala bana kar bheja aur un ke saath sacchi kitabein naazil farmaayi, ta ke logo ke har eqtelaafi amr39 ka faisla ho jaaye, aur sirf unhee logo ne jinhe kitaab di gayi thi apne paas dalaayel40 aa chukne ke baadh aapas ke baghz wa eenaad41 ki wajeh se us mein eqtelaaf kiya, is liye Allah paak ne imaan waalo ki is eqtelaaf mein bhi haq ki taraf apni mashiyath42 se rehbari ki aur Allah jis ko chaahe sidhi raah ki taraf rehbari karta hai
